comment.author: Steven
comment.text: Hillary wants the information released ASAP so her media mofia ABC,NBC,CBS,CNN can spin it any way she wants them to and turn the attention on to someone or something else before the election.

replies.author: Paul
replies.text: She wants that information released because she knows at any minute the FBI gonna come through that door and slap the cuffs on her

replies.author: Rebecca
replies.text: Right?! Creating a diversion from voter fraud and Wikileaks!

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: You are so correct. It is hubris for her to demand this. The FBI is not obligated to do such. She and Huma Weiner know what is there.
